chapters.heading: Introduction
chapters.description: Introduction to the brake system functional concept

workitems.title: Primary Brake Activation
workitems.description: The brake system shall activate within 100ms when the brake pedal is pressed with a force greater than 20N

workitems.title: Brake Force Distribution
workitems.description: The system shall distribute braking force between front and rear axles in a 60:40 ratio under normal conditions

workitems.title: Brake Release
workitems.description: The brake system shall fully release within 200ms after the brake pedal is released

workitems.title: ABS Activation
workitems.description: The Anti-lock Braking System shall prevent wheel lockup by modulating brake pressure at 15Hz when slip ratio exceeds 20%

workitems.title: Emergency Brake Assist
workitems.description: The system shall provide maximum braking force when emergency braking is detected through pedal velocity exceeding 200mm/s

workitems.title: Stopping Distance Performance
workitems.description: The brake system shall achieve a stopping distance of less than 40m from 100km/h on dry asphalt surface

workitems.title: Maximum Deceleration
workitems.description: The brake system shall provide a maximum deceleration of 1.2g on dry road surfaces

workitems.title: Brake Response Time
workitems.description: The time from brake pedal input to initial brake force application shall not exceed 150ms

workitems.title: Brake Fade Resistance
workitems.description: The brake system shall maintain at least 80% efficiency after 10 consecutive stops from 100km/h

workitems.title: Wet Braking Performance
workitems.description: The brake system shall achieve 70% of dry braking performance within 2 seconds of water exposure

chapters.heading: Functional Architecture
chapters.description: Functional architecture of the brake system

subchapters.heading: Context & External Interfaces of the Function

workitems.title: ECU Communication
workitems.description: The brake system shall communicate with the vehicle ECU via CAN bus at 500kbps with maximum 10ms latency

workitems.title: Diagnostic Interface
workitems.description: The brake system shall provide OBD-II compliant diagnostic interface for fault code reading and system status

workitems.title: Stability Control Integration
workitems.description: The brake system shall interface with Electronic Stability Control to enable individual wheel braking

workitems.title: Traction Control Interface
workitems.description: The system shall accept brake force requests from the Traction Control System with 5ms response time

workitems.title: Sensor Integration
workitems.description: The system shall interface with wheel speed sensors sampling at minimum 100Hz per wheel

workitems.title: Parking Brake Independence
workitems.description: The parking brake shall operate independently of the main hydraulic brake system

workitems.title: Brake Fluid Level Monitoring
workitems.description: The system shall continuously monitor brake fluid level and alert when level drops below 80% capacity

workitems.title: Temperature Monitoring
workitems.description: The brake system shall monitor brake disc temperature and warn when temperature exceeds 700°C

workitems.title: Operating Temperature Range
workitems.description: The brake system shall operate normally in ambient temperatures from -40°C to +85°C

workitems.title: Humidity Resistance
workitems.description: The brake system components shall withstand 95% relative humidity without performance degradation

workitems.title: Salt Spray Resistance
workitems.description: Brake components shall resist corrosion after 500 hours of salt spray testing per ISO 9227

workitems.title: Water Ingress Protection
workitems.description: Electronic brake components shall meet IP67 protection rating against water and dust ingress

workitems.title: Vibration Resistance
workitems.description: The brake system shall withstand vibrations up to 30g acceleration without component failure

workitems.title: EMC Compliance
workitems.description: The brake system shall comply with ECE R10 electromagnetic compatibility requirements

workitems.title: Material Compliance
workitems.description: All brake system materials shall comply with REACH and RoHS directives

workitems.title: Brake Pad Wear Indicator
workitems.description: The system shall provide warning when brake pad thickness reaches 3mm remaining material

workitems.title: Service Interval
workitems.description: The brake system shall require scheduled maintenance no more frequently than every 30,000km

workitems.title: Brake Fluid Replacement
workitems.description: The system shall indicate brake fluid replacement requirement every 2 years or 40,000km

workitems.title: Self-Diagnostic Capability
workitems.description: The brake system shall perform self-diagnostics on startup and store last 50 fault codes

workitems.title: Component Accessibility
workitems.description: All serviceable brake components shall be accessible without removing other vehicle systems

workitems.title: Brake Performance Test
workitems.description: The brake system shall pass all performance tests defined in ISO 21994 test procedures

workitems.title: Endurance Testing
workitems.description: The brake system shall complete 200,000 brake applications without failure in bench testing

workitems.title: Environmental Testing
workitems.description: The brake system shall pass all environmental tests per ISO 16750 automotive standards

workitems.title: HIL Testing Coverage
workitems.description: Hardware-in-Loop testing shall cover 95% of brake system failure modes

workitems.title: Field Testing
workitems.description: The brake system shall accumulate 100,000km of field testing without critical failures

workitems.title: Dual Circuit Design
workitems.description: The brake system shall implement independent dual hydraulic circuits to ensure 50% braking capacity in case of single circuit failure

workitems.title: Brake Failure Warning
workitems.description: The system shall provide visual and audible warning within 500ms of detecting brake system failure or degradation

workitems.title: ECE R13 Compliance
workitems.description: The brake system shall comply with ECE Regulation 13 for brake performance requirements

workitems.title: FMVSS 135 Compliance
workitems.description: The brake system shall meet FMVSS 135 requirements for passenger vehicle brake systems

workitems.title: ISO 26262 Compliance
workitems.description: Electronic brake control systems shall be developed according to ISO 26262 ASIL-D requirements
